1.content:
Welcome again to this story! First step is to choose the one you want to follow. Feel free to add on the other branches free from the SL mark!


That said here's the main theme:
-Helen arrived a couple months ago in the family. She's around 21 years old, so a young adult. Her job is simple, babysit the two kids, Rose and Dylan. She has free time and helps around the house like if she would be their elder sister.

As the months passed she got used to her new position and is starting to feel comfortable with them. Although she's going to find out some weird things that may happen...


The main storyline is from her perspective mainly. Alternate choices will leave you the liberty to add your part to the story so enjoy ;).

So! Where to go? The main storyline? Or an alternate path?
1.title: Storyline

choices: SL She dosed of for a little while
11.content:
An other shift coming up. Helen was coming down the stares, joining the family in the living room.
The parent’s where getting ready for the weekend.


Mother: -So you’re sure you can handle this? I’m sorry we have to go for a couple days… I really wish we could have taken them with us.

Helen: -Are you kidding? It’s fine! I’ve got more than the hang of those two little monsters.

Mother: -It’s just… It feels a little wrong and unfair to leave you up to it on your own.

Helen: -Well, it’s my job in the end. Don’t worry, I’ve got this. Enjoy yourselves as much as you can.

Father: -Hmm… I wouldn’t say “enjoy” is the word to employ here.

Mother: -Ugh, you can’t miss an occasion you… Well if you’re sure sweaty, then the house is yours for the weekend… Please take good care of them. And if anything goes wrong, call us immediately!


They started to walk to the door after kissing the two kids goodbye.


Helen: -Hey, you know how they are with me. Every thing will be fine. Safe travels!


She shouted from the door as they drove away. After closing, she sighed as the two kids were still full of energy at such a late hour.
Nevertheless she managed to put them to bed after a long while before she could finally relax on the sofa in front of the TV.
11.title: SL A new experiance

info.brief_description: Helen is just a young babysitter in a nice family for a year. But weird stuff may happen.
info.description:
Just a word of warning, pretty strong kinks here so readers discretion is advised. And yeah >18 content so please be careful. For the rest, I hope you enjoy!


We will be following the life of a 21 year old young adult, Helen. She’s from a foreign country but speaks just as good English as a native. Today she’s working for a little family in a calm village. She has the charge of two kids and gives a hand in the house every now and then.


As for the adding rules:
Sexual content is free as long as it’s only with adults. Characters <18 will see their scenes deleted if added.
This story will follow a main storyline, first choice is reserved and noted with this seal: SL. You can still add story branches, diverting from the main line, I’ll leave some out choices free for anyone who feels creative, but content added on SL will have to be removed for the purpose of the main story.


Other than that, again I hope you enjoy and feel free to get creative!
-Phoenix.

PS: If you want to add a new branch at a specific chapter, message me with a little sneek peak of what you want to add. If it fit's, I'll try to do it as quickly as possible for you!
